name: utilizable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
able to be used in an effective way: We calculated the amount of utilizable area for each territory. These self-build projects have used land which was not otherwise utilizable. See
utilize
More examplesFewer examplesUtilizable land in residential areas is becoming scant and expensive.Sugar increases the effectiveness of yeast by providing a more utilizable source of nourishment for its growth.These edible products can be enriched with supplements containing utilizable protein.
